New Records: Ireland secured their first T20I win against South Africa, leveling the series 1-1
Key Match Events: Ireland won by 10 runs after chasing down a target of 196
Graham Hume took a three-wicket haul
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won the toss and decided to bowl first
Ireland needed a victory to avoid series defeat
Post-Match Reflections: Ireland's historic win was celebrated as a significant achievement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held in Abu Dhabi
This was Ireland's first T20I series after a World Cup campaign
South Africa had previously lost a series to West Indies and a historic ODI series loss to Afghanistan
